name: 123Soleil
description:
The game:

1,2,3 Soleil is an hyper casual game made for everyone. You can enjoy the simple joys of being an elementary school student having some fun in the playground. Dodge all the obstacles while respecting the rules of green light red light and be the first to end the race.

How to play:

Touch the screen to start running. Stop touching to stop running. Move your finger to a direction to move your character accordingly.

Meet the team:

- Alexandre Vauthier: Game Dev

- Matteo Calle: 3D/Sound Artist

- Valentin Hernandez: Game Design/Game Dev

- Malo Braunschweig: UI Design
